borrowerStory.quote: CMRE made finding the right program for our luxury purchase incredibly smooth.
borrowerStory.story: The Anderson family purchased a 4-bedroom luxury condo with stunning Central Park views. With a purchase price over $3M, they needed specialized jumbo financing. Sarah Mitchell worked with them to secure competitive rates and a quick closing.
borrowerStory.name: The Anderson Family

borrowerStory.quote: My realtor recommended CMRE and I'm so glad they did. Everything went smoothly from start to finish.
borrowerStory.story: Jennifer Martinez found her dream 3-story townhouse in prestigious Brooklyn Heights. She worked with our pre-qualification team to get approved within days and close faster than typical market timelines.
borrowerStory.name: Jennifer Martinez

borrowerStory.quote: Marcus understood commercial lending in NYC in a way that made all the difference for our investment.
borrowerStory.story: Michael Zhang, a seasoned real estate investor, needed financing for a 5-unit investment property in Astoria. The property showed strong cash flow potential. Marcus Johnson navigated the SBA process expertly to close the deal.
borrowerStory.name: Michael Zhang

borrowerStory.quote: As a first-time buyer, CMRE made the process less overwhelming and more achievable.
borrowerStory.story: Sarah Johnson achieved homeownership with an FHA loan requiring only a 3.5% down payment. Robert Diaz's pre-qualification team guided her through every step, answering questions and explaining options clearly.
borrowerStory.name: Sarah Johnson

borrowerStory.quote: As a self-employed entrepreneur, I thought getting a loan would be nearly impossible. CMRE proved me wrong.
borrowerStory.story: David Chen, an entrepreneur who couldn't show traditional W2 income, found financing through CMRE's DSCR Non-QM program. Jennifer Chen's expertise with self-employed borrowers made the difference in getting him approved.
borrowerStory.name: David Chen

borrowerStory.quote: We found our dream home in Riverdale with great schools and space for our growing family.
borrowerStory.story: The Patterson family upgraded from an apartment to a spacious suburban home in Riverdale. They appreciated the excellent school district and community feel. CMRE's competitive rates helped them afford their dream home.
borrowerStory.name: The Patterson Family

borrowerStory.quote: Finding a lender who understands the LA luxury market was crucial. CMRE came through perfectly.
borrowerStory.story: A tech executive and their family found their forever home in Pacific Palisades. With a price tag over $4M, they needed specialized jumbo financing. Our team closed in record time for this complex deal.
borrowerStory.name: Tech Executive Family

borrowerStory.quote: CMRE helped us acquire the perfect mixed-use property for our business expansion in Austin.
borrowerStory.story: A restaurateur wanted to expand operations with a mixed-use property combining retail and office space in downtown Austin. SBA financing through CMRE provided the flexibility needed for this creative business venture.
borrowerStory.name: Restaurant Owner

borrowerStory.quote: Miami real estate investing required a lender who understood the market. CMRE delivered.
borrowerStory.story: An experienced investor acquired multiple units in a Brickell condo complex for vacation rental income. DSCR financing allowed qualification based on property performance rather than personal income.
borrowerStory.name: Real Estate Investor

borrowerStory.quote: Buying in the Seattle market meant I needed a lender who could move fast. CMRE exceeded my expectations.
borrowerStory.story: A software engineer found their perfect townhouse in the vibrant Capitol Hill neighborhood. In a competitive market, quick pre-approval and fast closing gave them the edge to win the deal.
borrowerStory.name: Seattle Tech Professional

borrowerStory.quote: Our SBA loan through CMRE enabled us to open three new locations across the region.
borrowerStory.story: A growing retail chain needed capital to expand. SBA financing through CMRE provided favorable terms and a long payback period, allowing aggressive growth while maintaining cash flow.
borrowerStory.name: Retail Chain Owner

borrowerStory.quote: In the San Francisco market, finding a lender with jumbo expertise was essential.
borrowerStory.story: A successful entrepreneur purchased a luxury waterfront condo in the Marina District. Jumbo financing through CMRE closed smoothly despite competitive bay area market pressures.
borrowerStory.name: Bay Area Entrepreneur

borrowerStory.quote: As a consultant with variable income, traditional lenders turned me down. CMRE understood my situation.
borrowerStory.story: An independent consultant with strong assets and excellent payment history couldn't qualify through traditional means. Bank statement loan qualification through CMRE gave them access to prime terms.
borrowerStory.name: Independent Consultant

borrowerStory.quote: Chicago's real estate market requires a jumbo lender with local knowledge. CMRE proved invaluable.
borrowerStory.story: A professional couple purchased a luxury high-rise condo in desirable River North. Jumbo financing through CMRE closed efficiently despite the complexity of the transaction.
borrowerStory.name: Professional Couple

borrowerStory.quote: Georgetown real estate is competitive and expensive. CMRE helped us move fast and secure our dream home.
borrowerStory.story: A government official and their family purchased a historic Georgetown townhouse with premium pricing. Jumbo financing and quick closing gave them the winning offer in a bidding war.
borrowerStory.name: Government Official Family
